post.title: Day 09 - Saturday, January 09, 2021
post.content:
One of the oldest question in the webdev book is how can I, a developer, get my website on top results of a search engine like Google and DuckDuckGo and for that you need to learn SEO. That is what I did for a little today.

I want this blog to be the best website that I can build with a proper backend (which I don't have right now as It is a static webssite for now hosted on gh-pages) and also I want this blog to be highly Search Engine Optimized and SEO is a very diverse topic and I dont know even a little of it and I started this journey by learning about JSON-LD and Microdata.

What I Learned Today

💻 Programming

  • JSON-LD and Microdata - Sometime ago I saw this blog post on benawad.com about scraping recipes from other websites and he explined in it that one of the ways Serch Engines scrape and index other websites is by using JSON-LD MetaData that those websites include in thier HTML. JSON-LD which means JSON for Linking Data as explained in this video is a lighweight Linked Data format easy for humans to read and write.

This article by Google explains how can I use JSON-LD in my blog posts to better optimize them for the Search Engines. and it also have some other guides for other kind of articles like for Books and Movie etc.

🗾 Langauge[日本語]

  • 経済 (けいざい) Economics.
  • 研究 (けんきゅう) Research. First Kanji is for Polish and second for Research.
  • 無理 (むり) Unreasonable. First: Void, Second: Logic.
  • 久しぶり (ひさしぶり) Long Time No See. Kanji means Long Time.
